segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a total eyesore right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor— filthy and slippery mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman standing there, clueless with her wet foot in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress probably getting splattered soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids pilfering cookies like little thieves on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookie bits could fall into the water— gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping wet, who knows what mold will grow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place smells like damp disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled up, adding to the cluttered filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't hide this indoor slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how negligent and nasty it's getting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off that faucet before it ruins everything completely.
segments.speaker: PAR
